name: HEXISCAPE
description:
;--------------------------;

HEXISCAPE one button arcade game.

Author: MrmediamanX of 3MX digital [2021].

;--------------------------;

GAMEPLAY:

;Hit the action button to move the arrow through the openings

of the hexagon cells.

;--------------------------;

CONTROLS:

SPACEBAR - Action

F1 - CLEAR/RESET SAVE

;--------------------------;
